alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 1:06AM CDT until March 13 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph near Lake Superior shorelines. * WHERE...Bayfield, Ashland and Iron Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation, the Red Cliff Band and the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
